'''"Parting is the beginning of a new reunion"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Parting is the beginning of a new reunion" is obtained from [[Huqiru]].

Variants of this furnishing exist depending on which Traveler was chosen as well as whether or not Furina has her Vision; the latter is dependent on the completion of {{Quest|"The Little Oceanid"}} at the time of talking to Huqiru rather than when the photo was taken.
